name: babel-plugin-copy-jsx-attribute
description:
A babel plugin to copy one JSX attribute to another.

Original use cas was copying `testID` to `accessibilityLabel` in non-production builds to enable test automation.
author: Jon S Akhtar <sylvanaar@mindspring.com>

scripts.example: npm run build && babel example/input.jsx -o example/output.jsx
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
